title: Unbound Bike Check: Mattia De Marchi’s Basso Palta with Prototype Campagnolo Drivetrain and Pirelli Tires
content:
We caught Mattia De Marchi getting ready for Unbound Gravel 200 this year with an unreleased Campagnolo 13-speed groupset and prototype Pirelli tires.

Read the full article at Unbound Bike Check: Mattia De Marchi’s Basso Palta with Prototype Campagnolo Drivetrain and Pirelli Tires on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
